alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque; Jackson; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:37AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jackson, southern Dubuque, northeastern Jones and southeastern Delaware Counties through 515 AM CDT... At 436 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, or 15 miles northeast of Anamosa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maquoketa, Monticello, Cascade, Andrew, Worthington, La Motte, St. Donatus, Bernard, Zwingle, Fulton, Hurstville, Canton, Emeline, Otter Creek, South Gary Owen, Dubuque Regional Airport, Garry Owen, Fillmore, Maquoketa Caves State Park and Ironhills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
